item.title: NFL Week 8 Team of the Week: Running Backs Star; Jordan Love Wows on Sunday Night
item.description: Greg Auman reveals the standout performers from NFL Week 8, headlined by two Packers on Sunday night.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From the Packers' Win Over the Steelers
item.description: The Green Bay Packers got the better of Aaron Rodgers and the Pittsburgh Steelers on Sunday night.

item.title: Happy National Tight Ends Day! A Look at the Position's Best on a Football Holiday
item.description: Tucker Kraft and George Kittle thrived, while two rookies rose to the occasion on National Tight Ends Day.

item.title: Does Kyle Larson's Past Cup Title Make Him Favorite at Phoenix?
item.description: Kyle Larson is the only driver in the Championship 4 who has ever won it all. But does that mean he should be favored at Phoenix?

item.title: LSU Fires Brian Kelly After Blowout Loss to Texas A&M
item.description: LSU's blowout loss to Texas A&M was the final straw for Brian Kelly in Baton Rouge.
